caption.p: Treatment of JIMT-1 cells with different solvent fractions of Ethiopian medicinal plants reduces the migration. a Wound closure at 0, 24, 48, and 72 h. b Representative images taken by an inverted phase contrast microscope at 0 h and 72 h. SO, aqueous fraction of S. oxyacanthum (52 μg/mL). CS, chloroform fraction of C. simensis (80 μg/mL). VL, ethyl acetate fraction of V. leopoldi (0.44 μg/mL). The data are presented as mean ± SD with n = 3. *p < 0.05; **p < 0.001. Image bars = 100 μm
